mapper.delete:
delete from cus_daily_report where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(aa.assoc_id) from (select concat(',',group_concat(`a`.`user_id` separator ','),',') AS user_id , a.`assoc_id`, a.sign from cus_user_assoc a where assoc_type='DAILY_REPORT_TARGET' GROUP BY a.`assoc_id`,sign ) aa where aa.user_id like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(',',#{beSentPeopleId},','),'%') and aa.assoc_id in (select id from cus_daily_report where status!=146) and aa.sign is null

select a.`id`, a.`com_content` as com_content, a.`uncom_content` as uncom_content, a.`need_concert_content` as need_concert_content, a.`wait_contet` as wait_contet, a.`must_contet` as must_contet, a.`create_by` as create_by, a.`create_time` as create_time, a.`update_by` as update_by, a.`update_time` as update_time, a.`del_flag` as del_flag, a.`status` as status, b.name as createByName, b.dept_id as deptId, c.name as deptName from cus_daily_report a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_by =b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept c on b.dept_id =c.dept_id WHERE a.id=#{id}

select count(a.createTime) from ( select create_by as createBy, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime from cus_daily_report )a where a.createTime=date_format( now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and a.createBy=#{value}
